All general views and angles must be included this wikiarticle. Can't leave out the basic purity of the operation of the spiritual gifts view or it becomes POV pushing. Clean up tagged added.
size of group is immeasurable, rapid declining of belief is suggestive & does not add to sentence, tidy up the function of tongues, moved the Cain Ridge Revival to history section. General tidy up.

Tidying up the two water baptismal set of beliefs separate from two holy spirit set of beliefs. Both are separate strands of belief such that there are a mixture of four possible salvational outcomes.

Undid revision. The Apostolic Church is Trinitarian (It's first tenant of faith says this), However the New Apostolic Church is Unitarian, which is where the confusion might have arisen.
The Apostolic Church (Pentecostal) does not believe that God is a trinity, but believes in the Oneness of God.
